runs.comm: Nicol gets forward and defends the first ball turning in from outside off into the covers
fired into leg and flicked straight to short midwicket
short on off and goes back and clips and finds conventional midwicket this time
comes down the track and lofts away through wide mid-on and to the fence to get underway
gets a thick outside edge which skews towards third man who makes a mess of the stop and lets them get a single
pushed wide outside off and he lets it go
short on off, stays back and guides it down through third man
charges down the track to a full and wide ball outside off and flatbats this over the head of a leaping mid-off with superb timing
outside off stump again and slightly short, chooses to shoulder arms
that one just reared up at Nicol, it was short on middle and zipped back in viciously and high up, Nicol ended up gloving it through third man, fortunately evading the slip in place
far too wide outside off to make Guptill pay and he is punished for the indiscretion
drives powerfully down the ground but can only find mid-off on the bounce

and gets slammed out of the ground first ball! This was absolutely crunched, short on off and he came down and pulled with reckless disregard for the safety of the crowd and sent it sailing high and long over cow corner
this is fuller but slides down leg past the attempted pull, not called wide, might have flicked the pad
poor ball as Morne strays on the pads, flicked away past fine leg who is up in the circle
waits in the crease and blocks to off and sets off, Duminy's throw was off target byt very little with Nicol struggling
defends from the crease into the pitch
full ball outside off and he crunches it past mid-off who dives in vain, superbly timed as the New Zealand openers start brightly
too easy to get under and Guptill picks up a ball outside off and swings it away to the midwicket boundary
goes back in the crease and defends
comes down the track and horribly skews a drive which takes several bounces to get to long-off
gets forward and sneaks a single after tapping and running to off
short on off and clipped away into the leg side
full on the pads and clipped away again, that was 152kph!

brilliant work there by the South African skipper, he missed the pull, hit the pad and rolled behind the stumps, Guptill races through but Nicol is slow to respond and de Villiers fires a brilliant throw which hits the stumps bullseye at the bowler's end to catch Nicol well short even with a desperate dive
this is short down leg and Guptill only needs to get bat on it to send it to the fine leg fence, and he duly obliges
again on leg, this time full and Guptill tucks him backward of square
this is even further down leg and beats Guptill's flick but the extra is conceded
stays back in the crease to defend
waits in the crease and punches to backward point
bangs in a well-directed bouncer on leg which McCullum ducks and sways away from
wristily works a ball from outside off into the gap at midwicket
comes down the track and blazes a full ball outside off through the covers with an easy clearance of the infield
waits in the crease for the 122kph slower ball and punches to point
defends to leg
works off leg into the on side to bring up the 50 for New Zealand
drives a full ball to long-off
pushed through on leg and tucked away, they really push hard and scamper back for two easily with Tsotsobe slow to come in off the rope
goes back and works to short mid-on
starts with a loose ball on leg which Guptill cheerily flicks away behind square to the boundary
waits in the crease and defends a ball on off down
goes back and punches down to long-off
is pushed back in the crease and he defends to off
Parnell again strays onto the pads and McCullum swivel-pulls him along the ground through backward square
this is fuller but still on leg and again McCullum makes him pay with a neat clip past the diving AB behind the stumps to the fine leg fence
comes down and almost yorks himself, ends up digging it back to Botha
worked off the front foot to midwicket
comes down the track and cleanly strikes this over the bowler's head into the pavilion where one of the TV crew drops the catch
gets a leading edge which rolls through mid-off
drives off the front foot to long-off
charges down the track and has a massive mow at a ball outside off without making contact
clips a short ball on the pads down to fine leg
punches a good length ball outside off straight to cover
superbly played, that was just a chip pull, it was on middle and Guptill just jabbed it away in short-arm fashion without much power but the timing was in sync as it headed over the midwicket rope
works this into the leg side
clips a short ball on leg off the back foot into the open spaces at midwicket
full outside off and he jams it out into the covers
gave a bit of room to smash this full ball outside off down the ground but can't get it past long-off
charges down the track to a ball fired outside off and has to reach to get a drive away in the air out to deep point
full toss which Guptill heaves away to the right of long-on but Botha is completely unsighted and starts to head the wrong way before seeing the ball and by then it's too late
this is a full toss on leg and McCullum clips it past the midwicket fielder and out to the boundary
short and wide down leg and Marchant will have to re-bowl that
short on leg and he drops it down into the leg side, this pair race through between the wickets like lightning
mistimes a full ball on off down the ground to long-on
again drives a full ball on middle and leg to long-on
slips another one down leg, too many wides from South Africa so far, past the flick and more gifts for the home side

South Africa get Guptill for less than fifty, it was short on off and he went for the hook over the fence to bring up his half-century but he top-edged it down to deep backward square where Albie Morkel was safely underneath it, a big wicket for the visitors who desperately needed a breakthrough
defends a full ball back to the bowler
gets down on his knees to paddle sweep a ball from outside off to fine leg
goes back and clips it back to Duminy
goes back and tucks it away into the leg side
full toss outside off, Kane completely mistimes whatever stroke he was attempting and skews it towards long-on
full outside off, goes back anyway and hits nicely but picks out close-in cover
fired in outside off and McCullum quickly shuffles to work it back down the pitch
Kane opens up to a full ball on off and smears it away to deep midwicket
excellent change-up there from Morne at only 127kph, slower ball outside off sees McCullum through on the pull shot well before it gets to him
another slower ball on middle and leg and McCullum misses the pull and it hits him on the glove
comes down and picks Morne up and deposits a full ball on leg over the picket fence at long-on
smokes a pull off the back foot out to deep midwicket
slower ball outside off and Kane bottom-edges the pull back to the bowler
gets down and sweeps through square leg
drives down to long-on
charges down the track and belts a drive down the ground with such ferocity that long-on, only needing to move a few metres to his left, couldn't cut it off with a dive

but Botha hits back immediately as Baz comes down the track and pulls into the deep but Botha had just slowed it up a touch and McCullum didn't have enough muscle on it to get it past deep midwicket who ran in and took a good catch running in on his knees
goes back and punches to a fielder in the circle on the off side
short on off and Franklin steers his first ball through third man
bangs in a bouncer on leg, Kane quickly gets under it but he is wided for height
misses the pull on leg, hit on the thigh pad, the batsmen race through as bowler and nearby fielder converge
backs away and tries to carve through the covers but can't make contact
this is full on off and Franklin swings cleanly and connects nicely, sends the ball sailing over the rope at long-off
short and wide outside off and Franklin upper-cuts with good timing and sends it sailing over the short boundary at third man
drives into the deep on the off side
comes down the track once more, doesn't get hold of this completely but still has more than enough on it to send it sailing over long-off
swings this with perfect timing over the rope at wide long-on, in fact that is out of the ground and onto the road, Franklin is driving New Zealand here with a six blitz
this is full outside off and Kane slapped it flat towards long-on who ran in to try and take the catch but ended up fielding it awkwardly on the bounce
full toss outside off is driven into the covers
waist high full toss outside off is slugged to deep midwicket
fantastic stroke from Kane, gets down on one knee and slog sweeps a full ball on off with nonchalance into the stands at square leg
Kane goes all Vettori on Morne, walks miles outside off stump and flicks a full ball following him through fine leg with pinpoint placement
half-volley outside off is driven firmly to the left of cover who partially stops it, but that can't stop the batsmen from sneaking a second
full toss outside off is smacked to the right of mid-off who slides and parries it towards long-on running in as the scoring is limited to a single

well that was all a bit understated, a full ball outside off which Franklin tries to jam through third man, ball hits bat as bat is hitting ground and the edge goes through to AB, they appeal and the umpire takes a while to send Franklin on his way as the players just stand around momentarily
de Grandhomme has a big heave at his first ball outside off and misses, he is known for smacking them from ball one in domestic cricket for Auckland, can he show some of that form on this stage?
Kane slaps a full ball away out to deep midwicket
full yorker on leg and de Grandhomme toes it back to the bowler
backs away and misses the wristy cut to a ball between the batsman and leg stump
charges down the track and backs away a bit but is followed by a vicious bouncer and he jerks his head out of the way at the last moment
finally makes contact with a full ball on middle and swings it out to deep midwicket
this is fired in down leg to follow Kane, who is hit on the pad trying to sweep, they scamper a leg bye but that is the end of an excellent over from Parnell at the death
fired into middle and off as it tails back in, squeezed out into the leg side
top quality yorker is jammed out to leg, the bowler runs across and nearly catches de Grandhomme short with a flick of his hand
swings a ball from outside off straight to midwicket on the edge and Kane barely gets home
top bowling by South Africa here, full ball on off is jammed out to fine leg
New Zealand finally connect with one, Kane swings a full ball on off over his favourite boundary at square leg, not well timed but it didn't need to be with the short boundary
this is full outside off, Kane tries to swing to leg and misses, they manage to rush through for a bye
